```{r}
# Load tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

# Example dataset
data <- tibble(
  name = c("Anna", "Bjorn", "Carla", "David"),
  age = c(23, 30, 28, 35),
  city = c("Stockholm", "UmeÃ¥", "Gothenburg", "Lund")
)

# Filter and summarize
data |>
  filter(age > 25) |>
  summarise(mean_age = mean(age))
```
